death.attack.soulFire: %1$s was consumed by a torrent of soulfire.
death.attack.soulFire.player: %1$s was consumed by a torrent of soulfire.
enchantment.mineplunder.soulblaze.desc: Sets attacked mobs alight with soulfire, deals more damage than regular fire, but powers up certain mobs.
enchantment.mineplunder.decay.desc: Applies the wither potion effect damage over time to attacked entities.
enchantment.mineplunder.toxic.desc: Applies the poison potion effect damage over time to attacked entities.
enchantment.mineplunder.frostburn.desc: Applies frostbite effect damaging fire mobs greatly and slowing targets.
